languages.text: {n}Злоба подзывает к себе одного из гладиаторов — тощего, дерганного человека со звериным взглядом.{/n} "Этого людишко зовут... Не помню как. Пусть будет Мясо. Мясо — хороший боец, и я тебе его дарю. Мясо — это тво{mf|й|я} нов{mf|ый|ая} хозя{mf|ин|йка}. Дерись за не{mf|го|е} и сдохни ради не{mf|го|е}".

{n}Malice summons one of the gladiators — a lean, twitchy human with animal brutality in his eyes.{/n} "This is... I don't know this humanling's name. Let's call him Meat. Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."
languages.original_text: {n}Злоба подзывает к себе одного из гладиаторов — тощего, дерганного человека со звериным взглядом.{/n} "Этого людишко зовут... Не помню как. Пусть будет Мясо. Мясо — хороший боец, и я тебе его дарю. Мясо — это тво{mf|й|я} нов{mf|ый|ая} хозя{mf|ин|йка}. Дерись за не{mf|го|е} и сдохни ради не{mf|го|е}".

Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."

languages.text: {n}恶棍叫来了一个角斗士。那是个躁动不安的瘦弱人类，眼中充满了野兽般的凶暴。{/n}“这位是……我也不知道这个小人儿叫什么，就叫他‘肉’吧。肉是位出色的战士，也是我送给你的礼物。肉，这位就是你新的{mf|主人|女主人}了。好好战斗，为{mf|他|她}而死吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Malice summons one of the gladiators — a lean, twitchy human with animal brutality in his eyes.{/n} "This is... I don't know this humanling's name. Let's call him Meat. Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶棍叫来了一个角斗士。那是个躁动不安的瘦弱人类，眼中充满了野兽般的凶暴。{/n}“这位是……我也不知道这个小人儿叫什么，就叫他‘肉’吧。肉是位出色的战士，也是我送给你的礼物。肉，这位就是你新的{mf|主人|女主人}了。好好战斗，为{mf|他|她}而死吧。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Malicia llama a uno de sus gladiadores, un humano flaco y nervioso con brutalidad animal en la mirada.{/n} «Este es... no sé cómo se llama. Le llamaré Carne. Carne es un buen luchador y te lo regalo. Carne, est{mf|e|a} es tu nuev{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a}. Lucha bien y muere en su nombre».
languages.original_text: {n}Malice summons one of the gladiators — a lean, twitchy human with animal brutality in his eyes.{/n} "This is... I don't know this humanling's name. Let's call him Meat. Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malicia llama a uno de sus gladiadores, un humano flaco y nervioso con brutalidad animal en la mirada.{/n} «Este es... no sé cómo se llama. Le llamaré Carne. Carne es un buen luchador y te lo regalo. Carne, est{mf|e|a} es tu nuev{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a}. Lucha bien y muere en su nombre».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}マリスが剣闘士のひとりを召喚した。痩せこけた落ち着きのない人間で、その目には獣のような残忍さが宿っている。{/n}「こいつは…名前は忘れた。とりあえず肉と呼ぼう。肉は腕の立つ戦士だ、貴様への贈り物として授けよう。肉、新しい主人だぞ。こいつのためによく戦い、死ぬのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Malice summons one of the gladiators — a lean, twitchy human with animal brutality in his eyes.{/n} "This is... I don't know this humanling's name. Let's call him Meat. Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリスが剣闘士のひとりを召喚した。痩せこけた落ち着きのない人間で、その目には獣のような残忍さが宿っている。{/n}「こいつは…名前は忘れた。とりあえず肉と呼ぼう。肉は腕の立つ戦士だ、貴様への贈り物として授けよう。肉、新しい主人だぞ。こいつのためによく戦い、死ぬのだ」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Tücke ruft einen der Gladiatoren herbei — einen drahtigen, nervösen Menschen mit einer animalischen Brutalität im Blick.{/n} "Das ist ... Ich weiß nicht, wie dieser Menschling heißt. Nennen wir ihn Fleisch. Fleisch ist ein guter Kämpfer, und er ist mein Geschenk an Euch. Fleisch, das ist {mf|Euer neuer Herr|Eure neue Herrin}. Kämpft gut und sterbt für {mf|ihn|sie}."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice summons one of the gladiators — a lean, twitchy human with animal brutality in his eyes.{/n} "This is... I don't know this humanling's name. Let's call him Meat. Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."

Ich weiß nicht, wie dieser Menschling heißt. Nennen wir ihn Fleisch. Fleisch ist ein guter Kämpfer, und er ist mein Geschenk an Euch. Fleisch, das ist {mf|Euer neuer Herr|Eure neue Herrin}. Kämpft gut und sterbt für {mf|ihn|sie}."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Démon appelle l'un des gladiateurs, un humain élancé et nerveux avec une violence animale dans le regard.{/n} « Voici... En fait, j'ignore le nom de cet humain, mais appelons-le Barbaque. C'est un bon combattant, et je vous l'offre. Barbaque, voici {mf|ton nouveau maître|ta nouvelle maîtresse}. Bats-toi vaillamment et donne ta vie pour {mf|lui|elle}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Malice summons one of the gladiators — a lean, twitchy human with animal brutality in his eyes.{/n} "This is... I don't know this humanling's name. Let's call him Meat. Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Démon appelle l'un des gladiateurs, un humain élancé et nerveux avec une violence animale dans le regard.{/n} « Voici... En fait, j'ignore le nom de cet humain, mais appelons-le Barbaque. C'est un bon combattant, et je vous l'offre. Barbaque, voici {mf|ton nouveau maître|ta nouvelle maîtresse}. Bats-toi vaillamment et donne ta vie pour {mf|lui|elle}. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: {n}Melanet, gladyatörlerinden birini çağırıyor. Cılız ve titrek adamın gözlerinden hayvani bir vahşet okunuyor.{/n} "Tanıştırayım... Bu insancığın adını bilmiyorum. Et diyelim. Et iyi savaşır. Sana hediyem olsun. Et, bu senin yeni efendin. Onun için var gücünle savaşıp gerekirse öleceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}Malice summons one of the gladiators — a lean, twitchy human with animal brutality in his eyes.{/n} "This is... I don't know this humanling's name. Let's call him Meat. Meat is a good fighter, and he's my gift to you. Meat, this is your new {mf|master|mistress}. Fight well and die for {mf|him|her}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Melanet, gladyatörlerinden birini çağırıyor. Cılız ve titrek adamın gözlerinden hayvani bir vahşet okunuyor.{/n} "Tanıştırayım... Bu insancığın adını bilmiyorum. Et diyelim. Et iyi savaşır. Sana hediyem olsun. Et, bu senin yeni efendin. Onun için her şeyinle savaşıp gerekirse öleceksin."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
